name: Blubird
description: Blubird is a comprehensive solution designed to bolster the productivity of existing Web3 startups and facilitate the seamless transition of Web2 enterprises into the Web3 domain. The platform comprises three essential modules: Tokenomics, Cap Table, and Deploy. The Tokenomics module enables expeditious prototyping and hassle-free implementation of token economic models, while the Cap Table module revolutionizes financial management in the Web3 sector by handling blockchain-style fundraising, equity, and hybrid equity-token offerings. Finally, the Deploy module provides an effortless and secure method for launching tokens, distribution contracts, and NFT collections, ensuring a smooth and efficient experience for businesses navigating the Web3 landscape.
